entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM AST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 2.

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
